setting.label: Turkish (located in english folder so disabled by default.)
(Enabling ALL is NOT Recommended, Just A Lazy Dev Tool.)
This is a fork of a fork of a fork of Cov/Exo.
Made for Kodi 17.6 and 18 on a S7 Edge Android Phone.
Support is pretty much for Kodi 18 Only now.
Language Files for translations are being added slowly.
All the Providers are checked by me by the end of the month.
You just gotta enable/disable the ones you dont like.
Sorted them in settings by type of provider and language.
The Debrid providers are disabled by default.
Spare Providers are disabled by default, some are dupes of others.
Enable a few if your wanting more results.
Its not wise to enable every Provider, thats just dumb and kills sites.
Sources that fail may need Pairing.(Like https://olpair.com/pair)
(Other Languages Will Not Be Checked Any Longer.)
Have a Question, Error, or Suggestion?
Wanna Tell Me a Providers Not Working?
Feel Free to Contact Me Anytime for Any Reason lol.
